basics.name: KISHORE KUMAR K
basics.label: Senior Software Engineer
basics.summary: A highly focused Application Engineer constantly driven by a motivation to develop my skills and provide solutions to challenging problems in production Environment, Incident management, Deployment, Application maintenance and service requests handling.

work.summary: Xome is revolutionizing real estate. Through big data, a proprietary real estate exchange and national real estate services, Xome is the one stop shop for home sellers and buyers who want to save money and complete their transaction with the utmost confidence.
highlights: Setting up a new Application support team and defining the process flow
Deploying packages using Octopus, Putty and Ansible in production and QA environments.
Using VMware and citrix machines. Logging into the VDI's and citrix servers and clearing the disk space issue
Using Solarwinds to check the status of the nodes
Monitoring the alerts using Moogsoft, New Relic and resolving them
Documentation of the new process or change to provide quick work around
Performed Ticket Audit. Motivate and teach the team necessary skills to handle a support project independently. Equip team to handle escalation calls
Being as shift lead and delivered a very precise shift handover and handled the issues among the team
Business reporting - Daily / weekly / monthly - Generating Reports requested by business
Coordinating the Incident Management calls and preparing reports.

work.summary: Cognizant is Leading IT sector by providing the client the best support and smarter products
highlights: The project uses Incident Management Tool, Service Now to track the incidents on the Production environment
Test and check the health of the systems round the clock. The operation tasks are performed in daily, weekly, monthly on a scheduled basis
To provide production support and maintenance for applications in Institutional and Individual line of business
Monitoring the distributed jobs/trails in IBM Tivoli Work job scheduler in Mastero (Tivoli) and Informatica workflow monitor

Providing the fix for batch job abends in Data Exchange Technology and Distributed Applications for issues related to file not available, Server connectivity, User Key not found, Server space issues, Encryption & Decryption Issues, Corrupt data
Working with different VDI's, Citrix servers and performing tasks/running scripts, queries & running jobs manually
